message.body: How are you doing?
Steve!!!
You beat me to it!
I was going to text you to say hi hahah.
Lol, I just seen to always beat you.
I blame laundry!
I just finished folding the last load and put it away.
How was your Monday?
Oh nice! Laundry day, lol. It wasn't too bad. I was at Princeton and at then Bensalem.
Whoa hit up both hotels today huh?
Yeah. Lots of driving....
Doing the same thing tomorrow?
Probably just Bensalem tomorrow.
Which one if closer to you?
Bensalem.
Excited for the kids?
Yea, I just have to sweep, swiffer, dust, and organize some papers and I think I'm set for tonight :)
Going to pick then up from the airport tomorrow.
Oh nice.... How long are they staying?
And my mom is planning to go grocery shopping tomorrow to cook a special meal.
*them
That'll be fun. Any plans while they're here?
Until next Monday.
Well remember when we were talking about the 1 month birthday party?
Well Xuan put it off until Vy and the kids get here so she's doing it this Sunday.
You're welcome to come if you want!!!!
And I'm planning to take the kids to Franklin Fountain.
My mom and Vy have massage appointments for Wednesday.
So I'll probably be watching them.
I think Vy also wants to get a hair cut.
And she said that she's going to find time to visit Osama's brother and his wife Heather.
That's what I know of the plans so far hahah.
Oh and there's an event at the Oval this weekend.
Last week they had an outdoorsy event I wanted to go to, but didn't.
This week they're having a "county fair" event.
It seems cute.
So I was thinking about taking Brandon and Adam to that.
Oh that should be fun for the kids. Won't be able to make it this weekend, I won't be here. Sorry.
Of course, Vegas comes first ;)
Does your family have stuff planned for Vegas?
Are you going to see any shows?
Yeah, some cirque du soliel stuff. And just free time. Lol
haha, yes, can’t wait for that...
Those shows make me nervous watching them!
They do done crazy stuff!
Oh the food is going to be amazing in Vegas!
Soooo guess what?
what happened?
i haven’t
Okay, so have you heard if Epic Systems?
*of
It's a pretty cool company I heard of a while ago. Does stuff with computers.
I was actually going to awing to wait until the next time I see you in person to talk about it. I'm just do terrified about it right now and still in shock that I've barely talked about it that much.
But I put my name In For consideration with them for a position.
Honestly, I don't think I even remotely have a chance with them.
But they emailed me to tell me that they want to do a phone interview.
I'm do scared that I haven't even responded yet.
*so
that’s exciting! don’t be scared... you’ll be fine, just talk with them
Steve, something's off. I really mean it when I say I really don't think I have a chance with them.
I kind of get the impression that they're the Google of the software industry.
hey, they giving you a chance, so you just have to make the best of the opportunity. I think you would have a good shot
what kind of position is it?
I would categorize it as a HR position.
Ughhhhh, what's wrong with me???
you need to build your confidence. Relax and just talk to them. This is exciting! It’s not going to hurt whatever happens. You get more interviewing experience either way
I know, and I know you're right.
I just never had a phone interview before and that is so nerve racking!
I prefer to see their face!
its actually a bit easier for you, less formal so you don’t have to stress as much
This will lead to that
I need that interaction, you know, to get cues to I could know how to respond.
Ughhh we'll see.
I might not even make it that far.
They haven't even seen my résumé yet!
you’ll be fine, but the first step is to respond back
Jeez, talking to you about it now is stressing me out. I need to calm the hell down.
lol, relax...happy thoughts.
you’re nephews are coming!
So how is the rest of your week looking?
Hampton tomorrow, and just an accounting program training on wednesday. Light week before i leave
Don’t I wish...
Hahah at first glance I was like "you're going to the Hamptons?"
Are you training people it are you being trained?
*or
That's good, have time up wind down and prepare. Have time to pack!
Yeah, I'll start that Wednesday. I believe it's warm enough for swimsuits, so that will help.
Oh lucky! While you're literally soaking in the sunlight I'll be layering up over here!
It got so cold!
It really is... I'm trying to hold off on the jackets.
Hahahah I'm close to giving in as it seems. I already washed some of the jackets today and waiting for them to dry.
Depressing. I'm still eyeing some if my shorts to wear out. Might not be a good idea...
Never know with this weather... It may warm up again.
That would be annoying.
So I'm about to pop a Prilosec that you so kindly provided me with.
My first poll for heartburn ever!
Kind if excited hahahah!
Lol, make you read about it. I believe it's one pill a day for 14 days.
Wait do I have to take it every day?
It's a regime, supposed to suppress it if you have it often.
Is it okay if I take one today and not take tomorrow if I don't have it?
I'm not sure. I'll do more research for you.
Oh no it's fine! I could look it up!
I'll take a look tomorrow and let you know
It's alright.
That's going out of your way!
Oh it won't take that long.
I wonder what causes it.
My sister says that she gets it when she eats rice.
It's the acid in your stomach I believe.
I hope that's not it for me since that would suck.
Hopefully not.
Yea because living in an Asian household and not bring se to eat rice comfortably would be a pain.
*being able
I don't think it's rice.
Hahah.
Do you know where you're staying in Vegas?
Caesar's.
That place is huge!
We walked around and went shopping there.
I like the fact that there's a canal going through the building hahahah!
Sorry, I totally passed out on you last night. Is the canal Caesars or Venetian?
I figured. You know what, I think it's in the Venetian! Excellent point hahah. Caesars is the one with the really big atrium!
Lol yeah, that sounds right. I'll be at the Venetian at the end of the month.
You're staying at the Venetian! Such a beautiful hotel.
Lol Caesars this week, Venetian at the end of the month.
Man, work hooked you up!
I booked myself. Company pays. Lol
Go Steve! Good move. Jealous...
What time are you picking up your sister?
Her flight comes in at 4:30 so I'll leave around 4 something.
Big dinner plans?
Well my mom made noodles which is like her specialty. I'm waiting until my sister gets here to eat.
I'm hungry.
And I'm actually one of those people sitting parked on the shoulder if the highway before the airport waiting for them.
Hahah.
Lol, there is a cellphone parking lot for that. That's legal.
Yea I saw signs but decided not to pay attention to that.
Hahaha, well you're fine as long as a cop doesn't come by.
They're here!!!
Welcome back!!
